name: Associated Talents & Allied Services
overview:
We are in to Information Technology and Engineering Services.

We provide following Engineering Services: Design Technical Support P&ID Development 3D Modelling Project Management Consultancy (PMC) HAZOP/SIL Services As Built Development FEED/EPC Short Term Expert Support Factory Acceptance Test (FAT) Support Site Acceptance Test (SAT) Support

In Information Technology we provide the following services: Web Designing Web Development Web Application Development Ecommerce Solutions Website Maintenance Social Networking Site Development Private Networking Site Development Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Software Development
